headline: National Lampoon Reboots ‘Lemmings’
abstract: “Lemmings: 21st Century,” a satire on modern festival culture, will have a two-night engagement in March.
lead_paragraph: The comedy collective the National Lampoon has announced a reboot to its 1973 Off Broadway musical “Lemmings,” which spoofed the Woodstock festival and helped kick-start the careers of several “Saturday Night Live” cast members, including John Belushi, Chevy Chase and Christopher Guest.
